import { BookmarkOutline } from "heroicons-react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import PropertyPage from "./PropertyPage"; export default function PropertyCard(props) { const property = props.properties; const currency = "$"; return (

{property.description}

{currency + property.price}/night

{property.address}

{property.bedrooms} br Â· {property.bathrooms} bath

{property.city + ", " + property.state}
); }
